name: Amedea
author: Moskva Yigit

sections.description:
A Collection of unique design elementor widgets are collected as bundle..
Within few minutes, you can add unique image hover effects to your website – easily!

Features

  • Elementor Widgets ready
  • Smooth animations
  • Videos are supported
  • Fully Responsible
  • Easy to use
  • WPML Supported
  • Clean, minimal and modern design
  • Powered by HTML5/CSS3
  • Optimized for mobile devices
  • Optimized for touchable devices
  • Installation guide and detailed documentation included
  • And more…

Click here to see the action on demo site!
sections.installation:
1. In your Dashboard click to add new plugin as normal WordPress plugin installation in your search type “Amedea” and find the plugin

    • You can download plugin from the plugin page
    • Use your file manager or FTP to Upload the plugin to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.

  2. Activate it through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  3. Enable plugin
  4. Please rate the plugin!
sections.faq:
What is the difference between free Plugin and Pro?

Free/Limited version allows you to check the plugins features and test it with your theme along with limited extensions. In addition to that, if you’d like to extend the plugin features to over 100+ extensions, you can upgrade it to PRO version anytime.

Does it require to install external plugin?

You may need to upgrade the version to the “LIMITED” one – FOR FREE, to unlock more features.

Is there support ?

Further support is available at amedea.pro/support

Other works

You can find out my other works as well as if you need further customization/support, you can purchases services from my website at moskvayigit.com
